creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: faded blue batik fabric divided into three sections of 14 red outlined eight-pointed stars and red square center appliques; three other sections are horizontal strips with square applique centers of fabric, some with patterns, some red, white and blue, bordered by red and yellow yarn
title: Turban
